first_translate: to fiona...

hangle: 어라… 저번 편지를 받은 지 얼마 안 됐는데,
first_translate: huh... but didn’t she just send me another letter not too long ago?
I wonder what’s going on this time around.
fiona, are you still--
still
not done yet?
well,

hangle: 귀족 가문 하나 무너트리는 게 쉬운 줄 아세요?
first_translate: do you think bringing down one noble family is that simple?
but don’t worry! I’m working hard as well.

hangle: 오늘, 황궁의 재무 부서로 익명의 투서를 보냈다.
first_translate: today, I sent an anonymous tip-off to the financial department at the royal palace.

hangle: 그린 가문의 불법적인 사업을 고발하는 내용으로.
first_translate: it was about house green's illegal business activities.
if they find out everything I said is true,
the entire fortune of house green will be confiscated by the government.

hangle: 이러니저러니 해도 그린 가의 재산은 상당하니,
first_translate: and since their wealth is quite substantial,

hangle: 황궁도 국고를 채울 좋은 기회라고 생각하지 않을까?
first_translate: doesn’t the palace see this as a good opportunity for them to fill up their treasury?
then two days later...
congratulations, brother zen.
congratulations, brother zen.
of course, it’s only temporary right now,
but if anyone deserves to become head of our household,

hangle: 작은오빠가 아니면 누가 가주 자리에 오르겠어요?
first_translate: it would definitely be my little brother here.
well...
that makes sense.
this is the document we talked about earlier.

hangle: 여기에 인장을 찍어주시면 전 호적에서 정리되어요.
first_translate: all you need to do is stamp your seal on it so that I can get erased from the family register.
okay then...
now go ahead and leave.
I have a mountain of work to do.
indeed you do.
oh, and there’s something else I wanted to tell you before I left.
there’s no cure for gambling addiction.
isn’t that right?
especially when you’re drowning in debt because of it.
especially when you’re drowning in debt because of it.
th-how did you know?!
th-how did you know?!
goodbye, everyone.
wait, fiona!!!
mmhm~!
I feel amazing today!
fiona!
you were still here all along?!
how dare you!

hangle: 네 오라비의 등골 빼먹을 생각 말고 썩 나가거라.
first_translate: stop trying to suck money off of your older brothers and get lost already!
no worries, madam. I’ll gladly take my leave without being told twice.
no worries, madam. I’ll gladly take my leave without being told twice.
before I go though,
there’s one last thing I must do.
what could that possibly be?!
if you’re thinking of any way to stay longer,
forget abou--
aahh!!!
y-you wretched girl!!!
my lady!!!
how dare you...
...do such a thing!

hangle: 다시 생각해보니 역시 한 대 쯤은 때리고 싶어서요.
first_translate: come to think of it, I’ve always wanted to slap her once or twice anyway.
kaindel has been banished penniless,
and zen will spend his life paying back debts...

hangle: 그러니까 부인도 제게 뺨 정도는 맞아야 공평하지 않을까요?
first_translate: so wouldn’t it make things fairer if you got slapped like this as well?
just what nonsense are you talking about?!

hangle: 핏줄도 천한 게 정신까지 이상해진 모양이구나.
first_translate: she really does seem crazy after living among those lowly people.

hangle: 누, 누가 이 정신 나간 계집을 가두거라!
first_translate: l-lock her away immediately!
p-pardon me!
m-my lady.
i-it’s terrible news!
can’t you see how busy I am right now?! lock her up first!
lock her up first!
n-no, ma’am.
right outside the manor...

hangle: 지금 저택 밖에 황궁의 병사가 몰려왔습니다!
first_translate: ...are soldiers from the royal palace!
they say it’s under direct orders from the emperor himself!
ooh,
looks like they came sooner than expected.
by the way,

hangle: 아버지와 큰오빠가 마약 사업에 손대고 있던 걸요.
first_translate: did you know father and kaindel had started dealing drugs?
which is why...
...I reported them to the palace myself.
as you may very well know yourself,
when someone gets caught making profits through illegal businesses,
everything goes straight into the national treasury.
y-you lie!
y-you lie!

hangle: 그러면 너도 처벌을 면치 못할 텐데!
first_translate: but that also means you won’t escape punishment either!
well actually,

hangle: 전 이미 이 가문 사람이 아니라서요.
first_translate: I’m no longer part of this family anymore.
without rights comes zero responsibility.
impossible...

hangle: 네가 지금 키워준 은혜를 원수로 갚는구나!!
first_translate: after raising you all these years, this is how you repay us?!
at first, I thought about letting it slide.
that’s because...

hangle: 나에게도 어느 정도 책임이 있을지도 모르겠다는 생각을 했으니까요.
first_translate: ...it occurred to me that maybe some blame lies within me as well.
that’s right.
I hated wasting emotions over this matter,

hangle: 나도 어느 정도 책임이 있을 거라고… 망설였다.
first_translate: and I hesitated because I felt somewhat responsible for it too.
if I ever meet the original fiona again someday,
if I ever meet the original fiona again someday,
I’d want to apologize to her.
but upon reconsideration,
I realized that human decency should've come five years ago.
from both sides.
keep this close to your heart.

hangle: 앞으로 두 번 다시 못 볼 수도 있잖아요.
first_translate: who knows whether you'll ever see it again?
countess green is inside!
aaaghk!!!

hangle: 그린 백작가가 불법적인 사업을 벌였다는 제보가 있었습니다.
first_translate: we received information regarding house green engaging in illicit dealings.

hangle: 때문에 황명에 따라 지금 이 시각부터 모든 가문의 재산을 동결하고…
first_translate: according to the emperor’s order, starting from this moment forward, every asset belonging to this family shall be frozen--
seems like the finance ministry works pretty fast.
hmm?

hangle: 그러고 보니 등장인물 중 한 명이 재무부에 있었던 것 같은데…
first_translate: come to think of it, wasn’t one of the characters involved in the story working at the finance ministry?
money... love...
uugh... I remember now...
whatever. doesn’t matter.
let’s focus on getting ready to move into hailon manor instead.
nooo!!
I finally became head of the family after kicking out my own brother!!
get your hands off of me!!
get your hands off of me!!
unbelievable...

hangle: 괜히 북쪽 산맥의 마물들을 지배하는 놈이 아니군.
first_translate: no wonder he rules over monsters in the northern mountains.

hangle: 여태 상대한 놈 중 가장 성가셨어…
first_translate: out of all the guys I fought against until now, he was probably the most annoying one...!
